actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend titles II and XVIII of the Social Security Act to remove the earnings limitation.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Social Security Act Amendments. Removes the limitations on the amount of outside earnings an individual is permitted to earn before a deduction is required from benefits under title II of the Social Security Act (Old-Age, Survivors, and Disability Insurance).

titles.title: A bill to amend titles II and XVIII of the Social Security Act to remove the earnings limitation.
